title: 怎么彻底删除细菌mod？？？？？
author: jj怪
txt_content: 如题，已安装神秘时代mod，细菌mod，稍有冲突，请问怎么删除细菌mod。

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
１。　放进无菌室里头超声波清除
２。　重新装你的minecraft．ｊａｒ

replies.author: jj怪
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2012-2-11 10:20 
１。　放进无菌室里头超声波清除
２。　重新装你的minecraft．ｊａｒ
求纯净的1.1minecraft.jar

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
jj怪 发表于 2012-2-11 10:27 
求纯净的1.1minecraft.jar
强制更新

replies.txt_content:
